channel.title: Corruption on The Guyana Brief
channel.description: Recent content in Corruption on The Guyana Brief

item.title: Uncle Ramesh Responds: 'ONE Point? That's PROGRESS, Beta!'
item.description: Uncle Ramesh from Queens celebrates the corruption index improvement, explains why 30 blacklisted contractors proves the government is WORKING, and has strong opinions about the Guyana flag at the Super Bowl.

item.title: Wednesday's Guyana Brief - Corruption Score: We Moved ONE Point, 30 Contractors Blacklisted, and the Flag That Started a War
item.description: Guyana crawls up ONE spot on the corruption index, 30 contractors get blacklisted, Ali tours Brazil’s gas plant, sugar promises continue, and the Guyana flag at the Super Bowl has people HEATED.
